name: mmail interface
short_description: MMAILI is an IBM i5 (a.k.a. AS/400) serviceprogram which provides an easy to use yet powerful interface to the popular MMAIL utility which is part of the easy400.net open source project. MMAILI is implemented with RPG IV (V5R3) and uses the MMAIL *SRVPGM
